At Swift Direct Blind, quality comes first.  Our roller blinds are expertly cut and assembled by our roller blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do our blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.

products.title: Screenview Black/Black Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Screenview Black/Black Roller Blind in Black. Made to measure from £10.36 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Screenview roller blinds, are a set of flame-retardant, dimout screen fabrics, made from a Pvc/Polyester fabric which are perfect for temperature control in offices and hot rooms. 
  
This black roller blind is perfect for blocking out the heat and harmful UV rays from your room, keeping the core room temperature down, a must for any modern environment. These Magic Screen blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let anybody outside see in. Perfect for maintaining privacy if you live near a busy road/ street or have have a room that is over-looked by other properties. 
  
At Swift Direct Blinds, with over 50 years’ experience, we take quality seriously.  Our bespoke roller blinds are crafted by our team of experts, and not only comes with customer-first service and industry-leading quick delivery times, but also comes with a FREE five year guarantee!  This means our customers can be sure that our products are made to last. 
  
Still not sure?  Why not indulge in our FREE sampling service, posted via 1st class post, or call our friendly customer services team for any queries or questions.

products.productdescription: The Palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Gibson Jet Black Roller Blind
products.metadescription: The rich Gibson Jet Black is a deep, pure black colour. Use this in lighter rooms or pair in with other black furniture. Don't be scared of the dark. The thicker PVC fabric makes this a 100% waterproof blind - perfect for the bathroom.
products.productdescription: The rich Gibson Jet Black is a deep, pure black colour. Use this in lighter rooms or pair in with other black furniture. Don't be scared of the dark. The thicker PVC fabric makes this a 100% waterproof blind - perfect for the bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.
